author: michaelsokol
title: NYC ... trip to the IBS hair show
text: The New York Hilton Times Square is a fantastic hotel ! It's s great location ..., we were able to easily access all of Times Square and a direct subway ride to the museum of natural history. Hotel staff were extremely helpful with all of our needs! Thank you Hilton
